artist: Designer: Charles G. Shepard; Designer: Peter Adams; Manufacturer: Shepard Hardware Company
description: mechanical bank in the form of a clown with painted face wearing red peaked cap, red and blue suit with stars and grey ruffled collar
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on back, in relief: [HUMPTY DUMPTY / BANK]; on bottom, in relief: [BUFFALO, N.Y. - USA / PatD, in U.S. MCH. 14, 82 AND JUNE 17, \'84 / PATD IN CANADA MCH. 27, \'83]
title: "Humpty Dumpty" mechanical bank
